mapper.select: select d.id as id, d.name as name, count(i.type) as untreated from dt_dictname d left join dt_itemdict i on d.name=i.type group by d.abbr

select i.id as id, i.name as name, i.abbr as abbr, b.id as baseItemId, b.name as baseItemName, b.abbr as baseItemAbbr from dt_dictname d,dt_itemdict i left join dt_basedict b on i.fk_base_id=b.id where i.type=d.name and d.id=#{id}
select b.id as baseItemId, b.name as baseItemName, b.abbr as baseItemAbbr from dt_basedict b where b.name like '%'||#{name}||'%' or b.abbr like '%'||#{name}||'%'
mapper.update: update dt_itemdict set fk_base_id=#{baseItemId} where id=#{selectedItemId}
